Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt with the Virgin holding Christ with outstretched arms Etching
Curator's comments: After Cantarini's painting in the Louvre Museum (inv. 175). For the original print by Cantarini see: U.3-59.
Bibliographic references: Massari 1997 / In 'Simone Cantarini detto il Pesarese', ed. Andrea Emiliani (19.I) (copy)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Hans Sloane (with Philipe’s annotation in pencil on verso: “HS”; with Philipe's blindstamp and initials HS)
